message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair start, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
Your offer was unfair to me.  I'm proposing a 52/48 split in my favor.  Considering inflation, this is a very reasonable offer for you to accept now.
I'm willing to compromise, but your 52/48 split was still too much. This offer is a fairer reflection of the current inflation.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. I'm offering a 50/50 split. This is the most fair deal and it saves us both from further losses due to inflation.
